scripts.db: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.deps: npm i -D @babel/node @babel/preset-react @babel/preset-env eslint eslint-config-airbnb eslint-plugin-import eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y eslint-plugin-react eslint-plugin-react-hooks morgan sequelize-cli && npm i express react react-dom dotenv sequelize pg pg-hstore axios
